rows.label: tlk70000024_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, friends! Want to hear new
mischiefs strategy of Ryuuryuu?

rows.label: tlk70000024_04_msg0002
rows.name:
First step is brotherpon
Kachocho make target fall over.

rows.label: tlk70000024_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Then younger brotherpon Yokuyoku
throw target up sky-high.

rows.label: tlk70000024_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Last, littlest brotherpon Komeme
tackle target to ground. Ta-da!

rows.label: tlk70000024_04_msg0005
rows.name: Mo? Friends ask what Ryuuryuu do?

rows.label: tlk70000024_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Ryuuryuu supervisor! Brainbox
behind operation! Most important!

rows.label: tlk70000024_04_msg0007
rows.name:
Ryuuryuu shout instructions to
brotherpons at just the right time.
Otherwise, strategy fail for sure.
